name: S l i m e : D i e t S a g a
name_original: S l i m e : D i e t S a g a
description:
Ruby is one of the most greedy slime monsters. Meal portion for everyday is too excessive that make his body enlarges thus makes it difficult to move. Some day, Ruby looked in the mirror and seeing his body became so fat and makes him wanted to slimming his body. In addition, Ruby is also concerned about the money and monthly food stocks that running low. In the end, he decided to start an important mission. This mission is hold back his hunger and excessive appetite for a month from morning to evening.

Ruby has to fight the temptations of hunger and excessive appetite. Having greedy habits makes him easily provoked and always haunted by delicious food.

Help Ruby to fight against his appetite that attacks him until grab victory!
